original_title: やさしくなあに 〜奈緒ちゃんと家族の35年〜
overview: Eldest daughter Nao is disabled but has a naturally sunny disposition, her gentle mother works hard, her father loves golf and drinking, and her little brother is great at sports. The camera carefully continues to record the daily lives of this family going about their business with laughter and tears, the same-old conversations, and familiar-looking living room and kitchen.
title: Home, Sweet Home
